title: Graystripe's Adventure
description: Don't miss these Warriors manga adventures! This box set includes three manga adventures from the world of Erin Hunter’s #1 nationally bestselling Warriors series! In the Graystripe’s Adventure manga arc, follow ThunderClan warrior Graystripe after he is captured by Twolegs in The New Prophecy #3: Dawn— and embarks on a difficult journey home. After being captured by Twolegs and seeing his Clanmates driven out of their territory, ThunderClan deputy Graystripe longs to escape his new kittypet life and go home to the forest and his Clan. When he meets a feisty kittypet named Millie, she encourages him to search for his lost friends. But with the forest destroyed, and no clear path left to lead him, how will Graystripe find ThunderClan?
author: Erin Hunter
